comment.body:
> [pycole](#comment_1_1KwTTgPRSTHFmmJAFBt6kQfdyNeSM5KJuH): Just a tip: you might want to not have the whole article displayed. I think a line break (blank line) will do that.

About an hour ago I was wondering how I could do that. :)

You mean the \<br/\> tag? Where do I put it? I tried putting it at the end of the article but it didin't work.

> [muja](#comment_1_17i7Y7r8nTaCfLbCAuaKyc4R5BbKZYU2Hr): Not sure about the blank line, but I know that --- in an empty line does it.

Hey, the ```---``` did the trick. Thank you (@muja and @pycole).
